page.title: 09NEW BUS SERVICE.
page.content: The bus service which operates in our area has just undergone a major new look.Instead of double deckers or large single decker buses the bus company now runs a fleet of mini-buses which they are calling "Badgerline". These sixteen-seater "Badgers" are now operating a more frequent service -as often as five minutes on main routes_and,being smaller than conventional big buses and more manoeuvrable , they can get closer to peoples homes in a shorter time too. They have a bright yellow and green livery and the "Badgerline" logo on the side of each vehicle .This makes the buses both attractive and easy to see.
